title: Ticket #5499: shadow can hang while rotating log when max log > 1
description:
Via rust, we have a report that a shadow was seen spinning in cleanUpOldLogFiles and other shadows locked waiting for it to release the rotation lock.

The customer used a debugger to determine that the problem is that the current directory is not the condor log directory, and that the rotate_file(oldname,newname) call in cleanUpOldLogFiles was being passed a simple filename as oldname, and a fully qualified filename as newname.

This is equivalent to calling rotate_file(pwd+oldname,newname), which is not what this code is supposed to do, but which would work if the pwd is the log directory. If it isn't, then the while loop in cleanUpOldLogFiles will never exit, and that shadow will never give up the rotation lock.
